00020 
00021 //! Example 1
00022 //! shared_ptr<Subscriber> ss1 = monitor1->monitorData();
00023 //! sleep(1);
00024 //! if(Snapshot<MonitorA> shot1(monitor1)) { // checking consistency (i.e. requiring at least one transaction).
00025 //! double x = shot1[node1]; //implicit conversion defined in Node1::Passage.
00026 //! double y = shot1[node1]->y(); }
00027 //!
00028 //! Example 2
00029 //! double x = *node1; // for an immediate access, same as (double)(const Node1::Passage&)(*node1)
00030 //!
00031 //! Example 3
00032 //! { Transaction<MonitorA> tr1(monitor1);
00033 //! tr1[node1] = tr1[node1] * 2.0; }
00034 //! 
00035 //! Example 4
00036 //! node1->value(1.0); // for an immediate access.
00037 //! 
00038 //! Example 5
00039 //! //Obsolete, for backward compatibility.
00040 //! monitor1.readLock(); // or use lock(), a snapshot will be copied to TLS.
00041 //! double x = node1->y();
00042 //! monitor1.readUnock(); // or use unlock()
00043 //! 
00044 //! Example 6
00045 //! //Obsolete, for backward compatibility.
00046 //! monitor1.writeLock(); // a transaction will be prepared in TLS.
00047 //! node1->value(1.0);
00048 //! monitor1.writeUnock(); // commit the transaction.
00049 
00050 //! Watch point for transactional memeory access.
00051 //! The list of the pointers to data is atomically read/written.
00052 class Monitor {
00053 public:
00054     Monitor() {}
00055     virtual ~Monitor() {}
00056 
00057     //! Data holder/accessor.
00058     struct Passage {
00059         virtual ~Passage();
00060     protected:
00061     private:
00062     };
00063 
00064     template <class T>
00065     operator T::Passage&() {return dynamic_cast<T::Passage&>(*m_passage);}
00066 
00067     Passage &resolve(const shared_ptr<Snapshot> &) const;
00068 private:
00069     typedef std::deque<weak_ptr<Monitor> > SubscriberList;
00070     atomic_shared_ptr<SubscriberList> m_subscribers;
00071     atomic_shared_ptr<Passage> m_passage;
00072 };
00073 
00074 class Metamonitor : public Monitor {
00075 public:
00076     struct Packet : public Monitor::Packet {
00077         virtual shared_ptr<DataMap> dataMap() {return m_dataMap;}
00078         virtual Packet &resolve(const Monitor &monitor) {
00079             return dataMap()->find(monitor).second;
00080         }
00081         typedef std::deque<Passage> PassageList;
00082         PassageList m_passages;
00083         shared_ptr<MonitorList> m_monitorList;
00084         shared_ptr<DataMap> m_dataMap;
00085     };
00086 private:
00087 };
00088 
00089 
00090 //! Take a snapshot for a monitored data set.
00091 class Snapshot {
00092 public:
00093     Sanpshot(const Snapshot&x);
00094     Sanpshot(const shared_ptr<Monitor>&mon);
00095     ~Snapshot() {}
00096 
00097     template <class T>
00098     const T::Passage &operator[](const shared_ptr<T> &monitor) const {
00099         return dynamic_cast<const T::Passage&>(monitor->resolve(shared_from_this()));}
00100 private:
00101     //! The snapshot.
00102     const shared_ptr<Passage> m_passage;
00103     const shared_ptr<Monitor> m_monitor;
00104 };
00105 
00106 //! Transactional writing for a monitored data set.
00107 //! The revision will be committed implicitly on leaving the scope.
00108 class Transaction : public Snapshot {
00109 public:
00110     Transaction(const Transaction&x) : Snapshot(x), m_newdata(x.m_newdata) {}
00111     Transaction(const shared_ptr<Monitor>&mon) : 
00112         Snapshot(mon), m_newdata(new Monitor::DataList(data())) {}
00113     ~Transaction() {}
00114     //! Explicit commit.
00115     void commit();
00116     //! Abandon revision.
00117     void abort();
00118 
00119     template <class T>
00120     struct accessor {
00121         accessor(const shared_ptr<T> &t) : m_var(t) {}
00122         template <class X>
00123         operator X() const {return (X)*m_var;}
00124         T &operator->() const {return *m_var;}
00125         template <class X>
00126         accessor &operator=(const X &x) {m_var->value(x);}
00127     private:
00128         shared_ptr<T> m_var;
00129     };
00130     //! For implicit casting.
00131     template <class T>
00132     const accessor &operator[](const shared_ptr<T> &t) const {
00133         return accessor<T>(dynamic_pointer_cast<T>(m_newpacket->dataMap().find(t.ptr())->second->resolve()));}
00134 private:
00135     shared_ptr<Monitor::Packet> m_newpacket;
00136 };

00139 };
00140 class XGroupMonitor : public XMonitor {
00141 };
00142 template <typename T>
00143 class Transactional : public _transactional {
00144     struct Data : public Metadata {
00145         shared_ptr<T> var;
00146     };
00147     atomic_shared_ptr<Data> m_data;
00148     void _commit(const shared_ptr<T>&t, const packed* = NULL);
00149     shared_ptr<const T> read(const Snapshot &shot) const;
00150 };
00151 
00152 template <typename T>
00153 void Transactional::_commit(const shared_ptr<T>&t, const snapshot*) {
00154     shared_ptr<WatcherList> new_list;
00155     shared_ptr<Data> newone(new Data(*m_data));
00156     newone->var = t;
00157     for(int j = 0; j < newone->watchers.size(); j++) {
00158         Watcher watcher = newone->watchers->at(j);
00159         shared_ptr<Monitor> mon = watcher.monitor.lock();
00160         if(!mon) {
00161             //Remove from the list;
00162             if(!new_list)
00163                 new_list.reset(new WatcherList(*newone->watchers));
00164             new_list.erase(std::remove(new_list.begin(), new_list.end(), watcher), new_list.end());
00165             continue;
00166         }
00167         if(mon->m_bActive) {
00168             if(packed && (packed->m_monitor == mon)) {
00169             //Write in the working set.
00170                 packed->m_newdata->at(watcher.index) = newone;
00171             }
00172             else {
00173                 for(;;) {
00174                     atomic_shared_ptr<Monitor::TransactionalList> oldrecord(mon->m_watchpoint);
00175                     atomic_shared_ptr<Monitor::TransactionalList> newrecord(new Monitor::TransactionalList(*mon->m_watchpoint));
00176                     ASSERT(watcher.index < oldrecord->size());
00177                     newrecord->at(watcher.index) = newone;
00178                     if(mon->m_watchpoint.compareAndSet(oldrecord, newrecord))
00179                         break;
00180                 }
00181             }
00182         }
00183     }
00184     for(;;) {
00185         atomic_shared_ptr<Data> oldone(m_data);
00186         atomic_shared_ptr<Data> newone2(new Data(*m_data));
00187         newone2->var = t;
00188         if(new_list && (newone->watchers == newone2->watchers))
00189             newone2->watchers = new_list;
00190         if(m_data.compareAndSet(oldone, newone2))
00191             break;
00192     }
00193 }
00194 template <typename T>
00195 void Transactional::write(const PackedWrite &packed, const shared_ptr<T>&t) {
00196     _commit(t, &packed);
00197 }
00198 
00199 template <typename T>
00200 shared_ptr<const T> Transactional::read(const Snapshot &shot) const {
00201 }

00204     typedef std::deque<shared_ptr<XNode> > NodeList;
00205     struct Property {

00207         NodeList children;
00208         weak_ptr<XNode> parent;
00209     };
00210     Transactional<Property> m_property;
